title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
ayout.

And of course, Photo Mode would not be complete without Post Processing Effects, adding Frames, and Stickers! Be unique and creative with your shots by experimenting with contrast, saturation, highlights, brightness, and vignettes. Add that extra material by adding a range of different frames, and to top it off, you also get to pick from over 300 stickers and add up to 30 to your scene, including emojis, icons, blood splatters, textures, objects, and items, and... CAT EARS!
